hero.headline: A Sales Agent That Never Sleeps
hero.subheadline: AI sales agent that follows up with every lead within 60 seconds qualifies interest and books sales calls automatically.

intro.paragraph: Speed to lead matters. Companies that follow up within 5 minutes are 100x more likely to convert than those who wait 30 minutes. AI sales agent for small business follows up instantly with every new lead asks qualifying questions and books meetings with hot prospects. It works 24/7 handles unlimited leads and integrates with your CRM. Businesses using AI sales agents see 50-70 percent increase in booked demos and 3x improvement in lead-to-customer conversion rates.

faq.question: How does AI Sales Agent for Small Business work?
faq.answer: AI Sales Agent for Small Business uses advanced technology to automate and optimize your sales and marketing processes for maximum efficiency and results.

faq.question: How much does it cost?
faq.answer: Packages start at $999 per month. Most businesses see 3-5x ROI within 60 days making it a highly profitable investment.

faq.question: How quickly can I get started?
faq.answer: Most businesses are fully operational within 1-2 weeks from initial consultation to launch.

faq.question: Do you work with businesses in my industry?
faq.answer: Yes we specialize in B2B Services SaaS and Consulting as well as many other service-based industries.

faq.question: What kind of results can I expect?
faq.answer: Most businesses see 2-3x more leads 40-60 percent higher conversion rates and 3-5x ROI within the first 90 days.

faq.question: Is there a contract?
faq.answer: No long-term contracts required. Month-to-month service with 30-day cancellation notice.
